description: These crispy roast potatoes are the perfect side dish for roasted meats, like this Greek-inspired slow-roasted lamb shoulder.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Roast Potatoes with Oregano Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a roasting pan with baking paper.

Place potatoes into a large saucepan and cover with cold water. Bring to the boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium-high and cook for 10-12 minutes or until just tender. Drain well and return potatoes to warm pan with butter. Toss to coat.

Transfer potatoes to roasting pan and, using a potato masher, slightly squash each potato to break it up. Add garlic and oregano, drizzle with oil and season. Roast for 1 hour or until golden and crisp.
